name: Blind Monk (Alex Zamurca)
description:
Survival Rage Game.

* Use 1920x1080 resolution or ability UI messes up - may be updated later.

How to run! Windows:

Run "Blind Monk.exe"

MacOS:

Open terminal, type `cd /blind-monk.app/Contents/MacOS/`

Example: `cd /Users/Alex/Downloads/MacOS/blind-monk.app/Contents/MacOS/'

Then type `chmod -R 777 blind-monk.app`, now you can run the "blind-monk.app".

Linux:

Right click "blind-monk.x86_64", select properties, go to permissions screen and tick the "Allow _executing file as program"
